Package application

Class WordManager

java.lang.Object
application.WordManager
public class WordManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the back-end of parsing and sorting words from a given website
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tristan Wood

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WordManager()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void countWords​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String element)
    Sorts the Strings in the word map based on times occurred given a URL and HTML element
    static void makeLabel()
    Sets the text of the GUI label to the String at the top of the words array, then removes the top String.
    static void showTop20()
    Adds a label of the top 20 Strings in words array and a sum of total occurences
    static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> sort​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> wordMap)
    Takes the word map and sorts it into a list with key value pairs.
    static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> wordMap​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String element)
    Parses each word in given website and HTML element by standard delimiters and returns word map of each individual occurrence of a word

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • WordManager

      public WordManager()

  • Method Details

    • makeLabel

      public static void makeLabel()
      Sets the text of the GUI label to the String at the top of the words array, then removes the top String. Follows the same process for the int of how many time the word occurs.

    • showTop20

      public static void showTop20()
      Adds a label of the top 20 Strings in words array and a sum of total occurences

    • countWords

      public static void countWords​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String element)
      Sorts the Strings in the word map based on times occurred given a URL and HTML element
      Parameters:
      url - uses URL as first wordMap method parameter
      element - uses element as second wordMap method parameter

    • wordMap

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> wordMap​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String element)
      Parses each word in given website and HTML element by standard delimiters and returns word map of each individual occurrence of a word
      Parameters:
      url - takes the URL of a website whose words are to be parsed into a word map
      element - takes which HTML element of the website that is to be parsed i.e. body, p.

    • sort

      public static java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> sort​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> wordMap)
      Takes the word map and sorts it into a list with key value pairs. The list is sorted by total times a word occurs in a word map and puts the most frequently occurring word at the top with how many times it occurred as its value.
      Parameters:
      wordMap - takes the word map that is to be sorted
